visibilityRule.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
We appreciate that there are likely several hurdles to overcome before formal bidding starts and timelines may change but please select the appropriate Bid Team and tick the below box to indicate to the Client Solutions Team that this Opportunity will likely require some of their resource in the future.


This allows the team to plan more accurately to ensure they are able to help bid this Opportunity when the time comes.

componentInstanceProperties.name: messageBody
componentInstanceProperties.value: This Opportunity has been successfully flagged to the Client Solutions Team to include in Resource Planning.

componentInstanceProperties.name: messageBody
componentInstanceProperties.value: When the contract for this Won Opportunity has been signed please use the button to update the Opportunity Sub Stage to 7.2 T&Cs Signed.

componentInstanceProperties.name: messageTitle
componentInstanceProperties.value: Please note the Account has an association to Russia

componentInstanceProperties.name: messageBody
componentInstanceProperties.value: This Opportunity is either associated to a Competitor, an Existing Customer, Strategic Account or has Active Opportunities

componentInstanceProperties.name: messageBody
componentInstanceProperties.value: When this Opportunity moves to Closed Won - T&Cs Signed a new Contract will be created. If the Opportunity relates to an existing Contract and a new one should not be created then use the Link to Contract button to select a Contract.

componentInstanceProperties.name: messageTitle
componentInstanceProperties.value: WARNING: No Contract Linked to Opportunity

visibilityRule.booleanFilter: 1 AND (2 OR 4) AND 3 AND 5 AND (6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9)

componentInstanceProperties.name: messageBody
componentInstanceProperties.value: This Opportunity is locked pending an RFP Bid/No Bid decision. It cannot be progressed until the Approval Request is completed. If approved the Sub Stage will be updated to 3.3 Develop Solution automatically

componentInstanceProperties.name: messageBody
componentInstanceProperties.value: This Opportunity is locked pending an RFI Bid/No Bid decision. It cannot be progressed until the Approval Request is completed. If approved the Sub Stage will be updated to 3.1 RFI In Progress automatically

componentInstanceProperties.name: messageBody
componentInstanceProperties.value: This Opportunity is locked pending RFI Compliance Review. To make changes please either wait for it to be Approved/Rejected or recall the Request from the 'Approval History' section. You can resubmit the request later by clicking Update Opportunity.

componentInstanceProperties.name: messageBody
componentInstanceProperties.value: This Opportunity is locked pending RFP Compliance Review. To make changes please either wait for it to be Approved/Rejected or recall the Request from the 'Approval History' section. You can resubmit the request later by clicking Update Opportunity.

componentInstanceProperties.name: messageBody
componentInstanceProperties.value: More than 90 Days have passed since this Opportunity was Closed and it has now been locked. Please contact your local Administrator if changes are required.

componentInstanceProperties.name: messageBody
componentInstanceProperties.value: Please review the Award & Contract Start Date

componentInstanceProperties.name: messageBody
componentInstanceProperties.value: Please note the Award Date has now passed. Consider updating the value.

componentInstanceProperties.name: messageBody
componentInstanceProperties.value: Updates cannot be added while the Opportunity is locked.

componentInstanceProperties.name: messageBody
componentInstanceProperties.value: You can resubmit the Approval Request from the Update Opportunity menu.

visibilityRule.booleanFilter: 1 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6) AND ( 7 or 8 or 9)

componentInstanceProperties.name: messageBody
componentInstanceProperties.value: Please assign the Winning Competitor if known

componentInstanceProperties.name: messageBody
componentInstanceProperties.value: Currency does not match Owner Currency and/or Account Currency

componentInstanceProperties.name: messageTitle
componentInstanceProperties.value: Please note the Account has an association to Russia

componentInstanceProperties.name: messageBody
componentInstanceProperties.value: This Opportunity is either associated to a Competitor, an Existing Customer, Strategic Account or has Active Opportunities

componentInstanceProperties.name: messageBody
componentInstanceProperties.value: Please note this Opportunity has no services assigned.
